long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple and user-friendly extension allows you to easily translate text into any language using reliable translation APIs. Whether it's a webpage, selected text, or manually entered text, this extension makes the translation process quick and efficient. It supports over 100 languages, including English, Spanish, Chinese, German, and many more.

Features:

 - Support for manual text input for translation.
 - Instant translations with the ability to select the target language.
 - Customizable interface for selecting your favorite languages.
 - Easy-to-use context menu for quick access.
 - Automatic detection of the source language.

How to use:

 - Install the extension via the web store.
 - You can manually input text for translation via the extension icon in the browser toolbar.
 - Select the target language and get your translation instantly.
